sentences.en: A dialectic coordination of the two will make them supplement each other.
sentences.cn: 握好二者的辨证关系就会相反相成.

sentences.en: And you don't have to apply historical dialectic materialism to daily life.
sentences.cn: 而且你不必把历史辩证唯物主义应用于日常生活.

sentences.en: Dialectic materialism figures out, intrinsic factor is the basic reason causing evolvement, factor is the condition.
sentences.cn: 辩证唯物主义认为,内因是最终引起事物发展变化的根本原因, 外因是事物发展变化的条件.

sentences.en: Dialectic studies how opposites can become identical.
sentences.cn: 辩证法研究对立物是怎样变统一的.

sentences.en: Enlightening dialectic is the rational historical dialectic to Horkheimer, Adorno.
sentences.cn: 对霍克海默 、 阿多诺而言,启蒙的辩证法就是理性历史的辩证法.

sentences.en: His germinal selection theory is pregnant with novelty and dialectic ideas.
sentences.cn: 种质选择论很有新意,极富辩证法思想.

sentences.en: It analyses the dialectic relations between them and brings material advices to bring it into effect.
sentences.cn: 深入分析两者之间的辩证关系,并对实施生态环保型效益经济提出了具体建议.

sentences.en: The dialectic relationship between music and skill in piano performance was discussed.
sentences.cn: 摘要论述了钢琴演奏中音乐与技术之间的辨证关系.

sentences.en: The relationship of agape and mutual love is dialectic.
sentences.cn: 圣爱和互爱之间存在着辩证关系.

sentences.en: This article would like to employ analogy, dialectic and return in examining these two notions.
sentences.cn: 本文将解说这两个主题并尝用类比, 辩证和回归三种思想方式加以整合.

sentences.en: This paper analyzes the dialectic thinking methodology of Mohist School.
sentences.cn: 分析研究了墨家的辩证思维方法论.

sentences.en: Thus the paper is written in the meta - language of contradictory dialectic explanation.
sentences.cn: 全文以矛盾辩证法为元语言展开解释.

sentences.en: We should use a dialectic perspective to view the world.
sentences.cn: 我们要用辩证的观点来看待周围的世界.

sentences.en: What I detested more than anything else was Hegelianism and the Dialectic.
sentences.cn: 我最讨厌的莫过于黑格尔体系和辨证法.

sentences.en: Wisdom lies neither in fixity nor in change, but in the dialectic between the two.
sentences.cn: 智慧不在不变,也不在恒变, 而在不变和恒变之间的辩证之中.

sentences.en: With regard to the persuasion achieved by proof or apparent proof: just as in dialectic there is induction on the one hand and syllogism or apparent syllogism on the other, so it is in rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 至于通过论据或明显的论据而奏效的说服：正如在辩证法中一方面有归纳推理，另一方面有三段论或明显的三段论一样，在修辞学中也是如此。

words.tran_cn: 辩证的；辩证法的；方言的
方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征

trans.tran_cn: 辩证的；辩证法的；方言的

trans.tran_en: a method of examining and discussing ideas in order to find the truth, in which two opposing ideas are compared in order to find a solution that includes them both
